item.title: Replacing a Leaking Plug Cylinder Head on a Honda Jazz GD1
item.description:
To remove the plug you’ll need to pry it off little by little on all sides, chances are the plastic is brittle and when you try to pry it on just one side one of the tabs might break off will remain inside which is bad.
Clean the dried oil on the surface of the hole, use a scub pad if necessary.
